src:
What Rock Icons of the 2000s Look Like Today

06 Nov 2019, 15:30

The millennium has brought us “millennial” celebrities along with new music genres, but good old rock music is still one of the world’s favorites. While there’s always new rock music to listen to, let’s not forget about the rock stars that were famous in the early 2000s. They may have started to show minor signs of aging, however, that doesn’t mean they’ve stopped rocking our world!
At Bright Side, we’re banging on the drums for our favorite rock stars of the ’00s and getting ready to introduce their modern selves to you.
1. Anthony Kiedis from Red Hot Chili Peppers


© chilipeppers / Instagram   © chilipeppers / Instagram  

2. Billie Joe Armstrong from Green Day


© Jeffrey Mayer / WireImage / Getty Images   © billiejoearmstrong / Instagram  

3. Chad Kroeger from Nickelback


© Jon Kopaloff / Film Magic / Getty Images   © RB/Bauer-Griffin / GC Images / Getty Images  

4. Thom Yorke from Radiohead


© Gie Knaeps / Hulton Archive / Getty Images   © Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images  

5. Serj Tankian from System of a Down


© systemofadown / Instagram   © serjtankian / Instagram  

6. Matt Bellamy from Muse


© Gie Knaeps / Hulton Archive / Getty Images   © muse / Instagram  

7. Alex Turner from Arctic Monkeys


© Dave Hogan / Getty Images   © Erick James / WireImage / Getty Images  

8. Jack White from The White Stripes


© Gregg DeGuire / WireImage / Getty Images   © David Becker / Getty Images  

9. Amy Lee from Evanescence


© Christina Radish / Referns / Getty Images   © Michael Loccisano / Getty Images  

10. Damon Albarn from Gorillaz


© Anthony Harvey / PA Images / Getty Images   © Joseph Okpako / Getty Images  

11. Avril Lavigne


© Scott Gries / Getty Images   © Avril Lavigne / Instagram  

12. Dave Grohl from Foo Fighters


© Mick Hutson / Redferns / Getty Images   © Terry Wyatt / Getty Images  

13. Brandon Flowers from The Killers


© Tim Mosenfelder / Getty Images   © thekillers / Instagram  

14. Alex Kapranos from Franz Ferdinand


© Jon Super / Redferns / Getty Images   © Didier Messens / Redferns / Getty Images  

15. Karen O from theYeah Yeah Yeahs


© ko / Instagram   © ko / Instagram  

16. Mark Hoppus from Blink-182


© Ron Galella / Ron Galella Collection / Getty Images   © Lester Cohen / Getty Images  

17. Dan Auerbach from The Black Keys


© Scott Gries / Getty Images   © Steven Ferdman / Getty Images  

18. Fred Durst from Limp Bizkit


© SGranitz / WireImage / Getty Images   © Stefan Hoederath / Redferns / Getty Images  

19. Doug Robb from Hoobastank


© Gregorio Binuya / Getty Images   © Gabriel Olsen / Getty Images  

20. Caleb Followill from Kings of Leon


© Maurits Sillem / Getty Images   © kingsofleon / Instagram  

Who was your favorite rock star or maybe still is? Share your favorite songs from these stars in the comments to keep the nostalgia going!
Preview photo credit Jeffrey Mayer / WireImage / Getty Images, billiejoearmstrong / Instagram
